title: Augmented Reality-Based Mindtools Learning: Socioscientific Understanding of Natural Sciences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic natural science concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Augmented reality-based natural science education for professional learners (medical/legal/technical) to strengthen social problem-solving abilities

learning_goals: Learners can visualize natural science phenomena through augmented reality and explain social connectivity via mindtool-based analysis
Learners can propose three or more scientific approaches for solving environmental problems using AR learning systems
Learners can specify feedback and derive improvements for AR content design through formative assessment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
